productDescription:
The coat is made from Dutch vintage wool blanket from Rotterdam.

Currently in stock. It is also possible to make another one in different size via direct order. Please allow 15 business days for production and delivery within the Europe.

optionalInfo.material:
100% upcycled wool
Lining: Vintage Japanese Cupro
optionalInfo.production: All the garments are handmade, hence unique. All the garments are locally made in Amsterdam. They produce limited styles.
